title: How do you be nice to someone who is rude?
description:
I recently saw this question put on Quora. This is a baseline attempt at answering the question. This answer is deeply inadequate even to myself, but I see it as a starting place. 

My Quora profile: https://www.quora.com/profile/Colton-Kirby-7

Make Sure to Like and Subscribe!

--Links--

My Website: https://www.coltonkirby.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Parler: https://parler.com/profile/coltonkirb...
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/_coltonkirby/
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/coltonjkirby/
